column4: is there a usb iso creator program for linux i cant find one??? i want to install arch linux iso for bootable usb
mm   well... unetbootin is less picky   but both work
unetbootin will not reject an iso that is not ubuntu
ok there is a button on the right labeled  ......
it has three dots  on the button ,, that will allow you to search where the iso image is
actually all you need to do with  this is find the iso image  and click ok  if you want this on a usb flash ,, all the settings  are already set for it
ok just find the iso ,, with non other settings, , make usre under "Type"  it is the usb driver  then click OK
to be honest ,, it took me a couple trys to get it right with unetbootin but it does work especially with non ubuntu iso's
it worked now, i had to install 7zip-full before to get unetbootin to work properly
